Text: No. But actually this is my first torrent!

i start the game normally, i start the singleplayer then appears something about the mission in a black screen, but when the game starts the screen gets white i just can hear the sounds!
will this fix my problem???
thanks
of-course it will, just try it

For all you guys out there. Don't download this one. The only thing you need is chaning your DX settings in the settings.ini file. You can find that file at: C:\Users\Your Username\My Documents\BFBC2. Just change the line: DxVersion= so its like this: DxVersion=9
Then hit save and try your game again.
I've tried it, before finding this one. That never worked for me or anyone else
Good first torrent Jodiac, fix worked like a charm. Two thumbs up!
Thanks man, I'm still looking for a fix for "quiet  dialog" glitch of this game.
